entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING

entry.data:
SCATTERED THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
LOWS AROUND 50
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND SCATTERED THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH HEAVY RAINFALL
HIGHS AROUND 70
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS
NUMEROUS THUNDERSTORMS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE AFTERNOON
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE LOWER 50S IN THE AFTERNOON
WEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS AROUND 60
LOWS AROUND 30

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
